attributes.action: Make Basic First Aid Mandatory in all school starts and professions.
attributes.background: Say somebody collapsed in front of you right now. Would you know what to do straight away, to increase that person’s chance of survival if it was life and death? Many people wouldn’t know where to start. It’s important that everybody knows how to save a life, so when the time comes, we all know.

rejection.details:
We understand that you'd like more people to have First Aid training, but we're not sure exactly what you mean by "all school starts and professions".

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/200085

Otherwise, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
